description: Ministry of Labour - Appointed Mr. K. A. T. Fernando as the arbitrator to the  Industrial Dispute between R. M. Somasiri with 17 others & S. L. Mahaweli Authority and Mr. S. Kariyawasam as the arbitrator to the Industrial Dispute between U. M. C. L. Fernando & Hongkong & Shanghai Banking Corp. Ltd. (Sri Lanka) (S & E only)
